long_description: Designed for use with race-oriented road bikes, the SKS Raceblade Long fenders feature extended coverage to protect you, your bike and those behind you in the paceline. Chromoplastic material encapsulates very thin aluminum and copper foil, making it corrosion- and UV-resistant. Flexible rubber mudflaps extend coverage further, helping protect your feet, bike and riders behind you from additional spray and grit. Designed for compatibility with road bikes with short-reach caliper brakes; low-profile spanners mount the top and lower sections of each fender to the brake mounting bolts. Angle-adjustable stays are lightweight and durable; clip connectors let you remove fenders quickly and easily. Easy assembly; mounting instructions included. Please note: SKS Raceblade Long fenders are designed to be used with 700c x 18 - 23mm tires.
short_description: Designed for use with race-oriented road bikes, the SKS Raceblade Long fenders feature extended coverage to protect you, your bike and those behind you in the paceline.
